title: Update member roles to include all motorcycle club ranks

requirements.summary: Update the role selector dropdown in the Member Management page to include all standard motorcycle club ranks
acceptanceCriteria: Add member form displays all MC ranks in dropdown
Edit member form displays all MC ranks in dropdown
All ranks are properly capitalized and formatted

file_operations.description: Update the role selector dropdown to include all standard motorcycle club ranks: President, Vice President, Road Captain, Secretary, Sergeant at Arms, Treasurer, Enforcer, Tail Gunner, Chaplain, Prospect, and Member. Ensure the dropdown displays all ranks with proper capitalization and formatting in both add and edit member forms.

requirements.summary: Update the Members roster page role icons and badges to visually represent all motorcycle club ranks with appropriate icons
acceptanceCriteria: Each MC rank displays with a unique, appropriate icon
Role badges maintain consistent styling with existing design
Icons are sourced from lucide-react library for consistency

file_operations.description: Update role icons and badges to represent all motorcycle club ranks with appropriate lucide-react icons: President (Crown), Vice President (Star), Road Captain (Compass), Secretary (Clipboard), Sergeant at Arms (Shield), Treasurer (DollarSign), Enforcer (Flame), Tail Gunner (ShieldCheck), Chaplain (Heart), Prospect (UserPlus), and Member (User). Maintain consistent styling with existing motorcycle club theme and ensure each rank displays its unique icon.

requirements.summary: Update the Member Management page role icons to match the expanded set of motorcycle club ranks
acceptanceCriteria: Member Management page displays same icons as Members roster
Icons appear correctly in the member list table
Visual styling matches the existing motorcycle club theme

file_operations.description: Update role icons in the member list table to match the expanded set of motorcycle club ranks using the same icon mapping as the Members roster page (President: Crown, Vice President: Star, Road Captain: Compass, Secretary: Clipboard, Sergeant at Arms: Shield, Treasurer: DollarSign, Enforcer: Flame, Tail Gunner: ShieldCheck, Chaplain: Heart, Prospect: UserPlus, Member: User). Ensure visual styling matches the existing motorcycle club theme and maintains consistency with the Members roster page.
